name: CoresyfTiling
description: Tool that uses SNAP utility program 'Subset' to create image tiles, according with the number of output tiles defined in a text file.

parameters.name: Division by mode
parameters.description: How to divide the tiles. Value must be one of 'Tiles', 'Pixels'.

parameters.name: Number Of Tiles
parameters.description: The number of output tiles. Value must be on of '2', '4', '9', '16', '36', '64', '100', '256'.
